column5: Anybody know of an Ontario tackle shop that is carrying them? Thanks.

I bought some buffleheads at bass pro in auburn ny once. You might be able to get them at the one in Toronto. I have also seen something similar at Paddletales in Winchester. I know he will ship as well.
Those look similar to the Jika Rigs.  If you can't find the Wobblehead jigs you can assemble something very similar quite easily with a couple of O-rings and a lead weight.
